name: UpdateCustomField
description: Update a custom field in a record.

parameters.name: custom_field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom field to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the custom field.

parameters.name: custom_field_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for updating the custom field, including 'default_value', 'default_values', 'description', 'label', 'select_options', and 'slug'.

default_value.description: The default value for single-valued custom fields.

default_values.description: The default values for multi-valued custom fields.

description.description: The description of the custom field.

label.description: The label of the custom field.

select_options.description: The list options of the select custom field. This is only present for select and multiselect custom fields.

slug.description: The slug of the custom field.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.
